Date: 2025-06-25 14:37
Subject: Planned Activity Notification: Maintenance for HO1 Ivanti Secure VPN Appliance - Reminder
--------------------------------------------------
 

 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

 

Please be advised that essential maintenance has been scheduled for the HO1 Ivanti Secure VPN. Consequently, the VPN service will be unavailable during these maintenance windows. Rest assured, users will be able to resume using VPN services once the maintenance is complete.

 

Maintenance start time: Tuesday, June 24, 2025, | 08:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Tuesday, June 24, 2025, | 10:00 PM GST

 

Maintenance start time: Wednesday, June 25, 2025, | 08:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Wednesday, June 25, 2025, | 10:00 PM GST

 
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.

 

Post cutover windows respective users are suggested to install the new version of Ivanti Appliance

 

For Internal User:

 

VPN Setup Instructions

chunks.text:
We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.

 

Post cutover windows respective users are suggested to install the new version of Ivanti Appliance

 

For Internal User:

 

VPN Setup Instructions

1.	On your Windows device, open the Company Portal application (search for "Company Portal" in the Start menu).
2.	Search for Ivanti Secure Access in the Company Portal.
3.	Download and install the Ivanti Secure Access client application.
4.	Add the HO1 network by clicking on the+ next to connections
5.	Use the links: HO1 users :https://ho1ssl.e-mac.com/

After the connection is added, log in using your Chalhoub credentials to establish VPN access Ivanti Connect Secure

For External Users: Please follow below links

 

https://cloud.helpag.com/index.php/s/m7cZAbQzLawMMtb

 


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
